post:
In honor of QuickPacket's 16th anniversary of our founding on June 15, 2003, we are pleased to offer LowEndTalk members the following special:

**Intel Core i3 530**

- Dual Core 2.93GHz with HyperThreading (4 threads!)
- 8GB RAM
- Drive options: **two 3TB Hard Drives** [or] **one 128GB SSD and one 3TB Hard Drive** [or] **two 128GB SSDs**
- 5 IP addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses available upon request (more available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI
- 20TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps Port
- Unmanaged
- Located in Los Angeles, CA

**$29.99 per month - [CLICK HERE](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=274) to order!**

QuickPacket also offers a number of software licenses as add-ons:

- cPanel - VPS $11/month - Server $35/month
- KernelCare - $2/month
- CloudLinux - $9/month with cPanel, $11/month without
- Softaculous - VPS $1/month - Server $2/month
- WHMCS - Branded $12.80/month - Unbranded $14.80/month
- DirectAdmin - VPS $5/month - Server $9/month

Further details about QuickPacket and the promo offer:

- QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
- Network providers include PCCW, GTT and Cogent ([AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261)).
- Looking Glass/Test File: [Los Angeles](http://lg.lax.quickpacket.com)
- Los Angeles servers are located in 530 W 6th St.
- Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden. Please review our [Terms of Service](https://www.quickpacket.com/tos.html) prior to ordering.
- We accept PayPal, VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Alipay (through Stripe) and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
- Coupon code is mentioned above and is embedded in the order links provided. The discounted price will be reflected on the second page of the order form.
- Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers. Promotional offers cannot be combined with other promotional offers.
- Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering.

Thanks for your interest!
